featured.text: Researchers found that commercial popcorn companies often coat their microwave popcorn bags with a 33 called perfluorooctanoic acid (PFOA) which has been found to cause both cancer and lung disease in laboratory animals.

definition.zh_def: 一種全氟烷基化合物，常用於防水和防油產品中，對環境和健康有潛在危害。
definition.en_def: A type of perfluoroalkyl substance commonly used in water- and oil-repellent products, with potential environmental and health risks.
definition.example: PFOA has been banned in several countries due to its harmful effects on human health.
